name: Idle Folktales
description:
Idle Folktales is a short idle clicker game designed to be calm and relaxing. Play in the background during class or at home and compete with friends to see who can end the game in the shortest amount of time.

- Made with python (code) and piskel (artwork). 

-This took around 5+ hours to code and 15+ hours for the artwork, so please vote for me.
